mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LESSON WHERE LT_NO = #{ltNo} ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON(SERIAL_NO, LSN_NO, TTL, LSN_FILE, LT_NO, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SERIAL_NO), 0)+1 FROM LESSON), #{lsnNo}, #{ttl}, #{lsnFile}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(LT_NO), 0) FROM LECTURE), SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
